entry.title: Omicron Variant Sends Policy Makers Scrambling as Science Lags Behind
entry.content: Researchers are evaluating the variant’s mutations and tracking infections to evaluate the threat it poses.

entry.title: Leaked Documents Detail Xi Jinping's Extensive Role in Xinjiang Crackdown
entry.content: Records of internal speeches released by a U.K.-based panel of lawyers and activists show how China’s leader set the blueprint for the vast campaign of forcible assimilation against Uyghurs and other groups.

entry.title: Bali Was Slammed With Tourists Before Covid. Now It's Slammed Without.
entry.content: Travel destinations that strained under crowds of visitors before the pandemic now confront the possibility they won’t be back for years. “This is a lesson for us. We can’t stay so dependent on tourism.”
